    Plots

    Anne

    04/11/2020

    Result plots.Rmd
    library(KidneyAllocation)
library(dplyr)
    ## 
## Attaching package: 'dplyr'
    ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
## 
##     filter, lag
    ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
## 
##     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
    library(reshape2)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(ggthemes)
theme_update(text = element_text(size=20))
data("rawdata")
data("newdata")
dim(rawdata)
    ## [1] 5945   80
    dim(raw_donor_matrix)
    ## [1] 2835   28
    dim(raw_recip_matrix)
    ## [1] 5821   49
    dim(raw_recip_matrix_subset) 
    ## [1] 1477   49
    state_order = c("NSW", "VIC", "QLD", "SA", "WA")

rawdata$score  <- allocation_national(rawdata,rawdata,HLAmatchCalMat(rawdata,rawdata))
rawdata <- rawdata %>% mutate(recip_listtime=recip_listtime/365,
                              Simulation = "Actual") %>% rename("Actual" = "recip_listtime")
rawdata$recip_state <- factor(rawdata$recip_state, levels = state_order)
rawdata$pra_group <-cut(rawdata$recip_pra,
                 c(0, 50, 80, 100),
                 include.lowest = TRUE,
                 right = FALSE)

    plots

    weightedscore_random=readRDS("weightedscore_rlist.rds")
selectmax_random=readRDS("selectmax_rlist.rds")
simpledecision_random=readRDS("simpledecision_rlist.rds")
nesteddtree_random=readRDS("nesteddtree_rlist.rds")

dataFrame = function(data, list_num = 1){
    data_mat = NULL
    for (i in 1:10){
        data_mat = rbind(data_mat, data[[i]][[list_num]] )
    }
    
    data_mat$recip_state <- factor(data_mat$recip_state, levels = state_order)
    return(data_mat)
}



# relevant_variables <- c("recip_id", "recip_pra", "recip_blgroup", "recip_graftno", "recip_a1", "recip_a2", "recip_b1","recip_b2", "recip_dr1",  "recip_dr2", "recip_sex", "recip_state", "donor_state", "donor_blgroup", "donor_a1", "donor_a2", "donor_b1", "donor_b2", "donor_dr1", "donor_dr2", "recip_age", "recip_epts", "donor_kdri", "score")

weightedscore_random <- dataFrame(weightedscore_random)
selectmax_random <- dataFrame(selectmax_random)
simpledecision_random <- dataFrame(simpledecision_random)
nesteddtree_random <- dataFrame(nesteddtree_random)


weightedscore_random <- weightedscore_random %>% mutate(sim_listtime = as.numeric(tx_date - recip_sim_listdate)/365,
                                                        algorithm = ifelse(algorithm == "State", "State", "National"),
                                                        Simulation = "DM: Weighted Score") %>% rename("DM: Weighted Score" = "sim_listtime")

weightedscore_random$pra_group <-cut(weightedscore_random$recip_pra,
                 c(0, 50, 80, 100),
                 include.lowest = TRUE,
                 right = FALSE)

selectmax_random<- selectmax_random %>% mutate(sim_listtime = as.numeric(tx_date - recip_sim_listdate)/365,
                                                algorithm = ifelse(algorithm == "State", "State", "National"),
                                               Simulation = "Select Maximum")%>% rename("Select Maximum" = "sim_listtime")
selectmax_random$pra_group <-cut(selectmax_random$recip_pra,
                 c(0, 50, 80, 100),
                 include.lowest = TRUE,
                 right = FALSE)

simpledecision_random<- simpledecision_random %>% mutate(sim_listtime = as.numeric(tx_date - recip_sim_listdate)/365,
                                                algorithm = ifelse(algorithm == "State", "State", "National"),
                                                Simulation = "DM: Simple Decision")%>% 
    rename("DM: Simple Decision" = "sim_listtime")

simpledecision_random$pra_group <-cut(simpledecision_random$recip_pra,
                 c(0, 50, 80, 100),
                 include.lowest = TRUE,
                 right = FALSE)

nesteddtree_random<- nesteddtree_random %>% mutate(sim_listtime = as.numeric(tx_date - recip_sim_listdate)/365,
                                                algorithm = ifelse(algorithm == "State", "State", "National"),
                                                Simulation = "DM: Decision Tree")%>% 
    rename("DM: Decision Tree" = "sim_listtime")
nesteddtree_random$pra_group <-cut(nesteddtree_random$recip_pra,
                 c(0, 50, 80, 100),
                 include.lowest = TRUE,
                 right = FALSE)

    recip state

    data1.1 <- rbind( reshape2::melt(rawdata[, c("Actual", "recip_state")]),
               reshape2::melt(selectmax_random[, c("Select Maximum", "recip_state")]), 
             reshape2::melt(nesteddtree_random[, c("DM: Decision Tree", "recip_state")]),
             reshape2::melt(weightedscore_random[, c("DM: Weighted Score", "recip_state")]),
             reshape2::melt(simpledecision_random[, c("DM: Simple Decision", "recip_state")]))
    ## Using recip_state as id variables
## Using recip_state as id variables
## Using recip_state as id variables
## Using recip_state as id variables
## Using recip_state as id variables
    gg1.1 <- data1.1 %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x=recip_state, y=value, fill=variable)) + 
        geom_boxplot() + 
        theme_bw() + scale_fill_tableau() +  theme(aspect.ratio = 1, legend.position = "top") + labs( y = "List time (years)", x = "States", title = "Listtime stratified by State")+guides(fill=guide_legend(title="Model", nrow=3))+theme(text=element_text(size=18))
gg1.1

    gg_1.2 <- function(data){ data <- data %>% dplyr::select(Simulation, algorithm) }

rawdata1.2 <- rawdata %>% mutate(algorithm = ifelse(algorithm == "State", "Actual State", "Actual National"))%>% dplyr::select(Simulation, algorithm)

data1.2 <- rbind(rawdata1.2, gg_1.2(selectmax_random), gg_1.2(nesteddtree_random), gg_1.2(weightedscore_random), gg_1.2(simpledecision_random)  )

gg1.2 <- ggplot(data1.2, aes(x = Simulation, fill = algorithm)) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent) +theme_bw() + scale_fill_tableau() +  theme(aspect.ratio = 1, legend.position = "top") + labs( y = "Percentage (%)", x = "Model", title = "Algorithm Proportions")+guides(fill=guide_legend(title="Algorithm", nrow = 2))+
  scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(n.dodge = 2))+theme(text=element_text(size=18))

ggarrange(gg1.2, gg1.1, ncol = 2, nrow = 1 )

    recip state, algorithm

    data1.1.5 <- rbind( reshape2::melt(rawdata[, c("Actual", "recip_state", "algorithm")]),
               reshape2::melt(selectmax_random[, c("Select Maximum", "recip_state", "algorithm")]), 
             reshape2::melt(nesteddtree_random[, c("DM: Decision Tree", "recip_state", "algorithm")]),
             reshape2::melt(weightedscore_random[, c("DM: Weighted Score", "recip_state", "algorithm")]),
             reshape2::melt(simpledecision_random[, c("DM: Simple Decision", "recip_state", "algorithm")]))
    ## Using recip_state, algorithm as id variables
## Using recip_state, algorithm as id variables
## Using recip_state, algorithm as id variables
## Using recip_state, algorithm as id variables
## Using recip_state, algorithm as id variables
    gg1.1.5 <- data1.1.5 %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x=recip_state, y=value, fill=variable)) + 
        geom_boxplot() + facet_grid(~algorithm)+
        theme_bw()+ scale_fill_tableau() +  theme(aspect.ratio = 0.5, legend.position = "right") + labs( y = "List time (years)", x = "States", title = "Listtime stratified by State and Algorithm")+guides(fill=guide_legend(title="Model"))+theme(text=element_text(size=18))
gg1.1.5

    gg_1.2.5 <- function(data){ data <- data %>% dplyr::select(Simulation, algorithm, recip_state) }

data1.2.5 <- rbind(gg_1.2.5(rawdata), gg_1.2.5(selectmax_random), gg_1.2.5(nesteddtree_random), gg_1.2.5(weightedscore_random), gg_1.2.5(simpledecision_random)  )

gg1.2.5 <- ggplot(data1.2.5, aes(x = Simulation, fill = recip_state)) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill") + facet_grid(~algorithm)+
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent) +theme_bw() + scale_fill_tableau() +  theme(aspect.ratio = 0.5, legend.position = "right") + labs( y = "Percentage (%)", x = "Model", title = "Algorithm Proportions by State")+guides(fill=guide_legend(title="State"))+
  scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(n.dodge = 2))+theme(text=element_text(size=18))
gg1.2.5

    recip state, algorithm, PRA

    data1.5 <- rbind( reshape2::melt(rawdata[, c("Actual", "recip_state", "algorithm", "pra_group")]),
               reshape2::melt(selectmax_random[, c("Select Maximum", "recip_state", "algorithm","pra_group")]), 
             reshape2::melt(nesteddtree_random[, c("DM: Decision Tree", "recip_state", "algorithm","pra_group")]),
             reshape2::melt(weightedscore_random[, c("DM: Weighted Score", "recip_state", "algorithm","pra_group")]),
             reshape2::melt(simpledecision_random[, c("DM: Simple Decision", "recip_state", "algorithm","pra_group")]))
    ## Using recip_state, algorithm, pra_group as id variables
## Using recip_state, algorithm, pra_group as id variables
## Using recip_state, algorithm, pra_group as id variables
## Using recip_state, algorithm, pra_group as id variables
## Using recip_state, algorithm, pra_group as id variables
    gg1.5 <- data1.5 %>%tidyr::drop_na(pra_group) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=recip_state, y=value, fill=variable)) + 
        geom_boxplot() + facet_grid(algorithm~pra_group)+
        theme_bw()+ scale_fill_tableau() +  theme(aspect.ratio = 0.7, legend.position = "top") + labs( y = "List time (years)", x = "States", title = "Listtime stratified by State, Algorithm and PRA group")+guides(fill=guide_legend(title="Model",nrow=2))+theme(text=element_text(size=18)) +coord_flip()
gg1.5

    weightedscore_random=readRDS("weightedscore_rlist.rds")
selectmax_random=readRDS("selectmax_rlist.rds")
simpledecision_random=readRDS("simpledecision_rlist.rds")
nesteddtree_random=readRDS("nesteddtree_rlist.rds")

dataFrame = function(data, list_num = 1){
    data_mat = NULL
    for (i in 1:10){
        data_mat = rbind(data_mat, data[[i]][[list_num]] )
    }
    
    data_mat$recip_state <- factor(data_mat$recip_state, levels = state_order)
    return(data_mat)
}



# relevant_variables <- c("recip_id", "recip_pra", "recip_blgroup", "recip_graftno", "recip_a1", "recip_a2", "recip_b1","recip_b2", "recip_dr1",  "recip_dr2", "recip_sex", "recip_state", "donor_state", "donor_blgroup", "donor_a1", "donor_a2", "donor_b1", "donor_b2", "donor_dr1", "donor_dr2", "recip_age", "recip_epts", "donor_kdri", "score")

weightedscore_random <- dataFrame(weightedscore_random)
selectmax_random <- dataFrame(selectmax_random)
simpledecision_random <- dataFrame(simpledecision_random)
nesteddtree_random <- dataFrame(nesteddtree_random)


weightedscore_random <- weightedscore_random %>% mutate(sim_listtime = as.numeric(tx_date - recip_sim_listdate)/365,
                                                        algorithm = ifelse(algorithm == "State", "State", "National"),
                                                        Simulation = "DM: Weighted Score") %>% rename("DM: Weighted Score" = "sim_listtime")


selectmax_random<- selectmax_random %>% mutate(sim_listtime = as.numeric(tx_date - recip_sim_listdate)/365,
                                                algorithm = ifelse(algorithm == "State", "State", "National"),
                                               Simulation = "Select Maximum")%>% rename("Select Maximum" = "sim_listtime")

simpledecision_random<- simpledecision_random %>% mutate(sim_listtime = as.numeric(tx_date - recip_sim_listdate)/365,
                                                algorithm = ifelse(algorithm == "State", "State", "National"),
                                                Simulation = "DM: Simple Decision")%>% 
    rename("DM: Simple Decision" = "sim_listtime")

nesteddtree_random<- nesteddtree_random %>% mutate(sim_listtime = as.numeric(tx_date - recip_sim_listdate)/365,
                                                algorithm = ifelse(algorithm == "State", "State", "National"),
                                                Simulation = "DM: Decision Tree")%>% 
    rename("DM: Decision Tree" = "sim_listtime")
